mapper.select: SELECT u.no no, u.name name, u.profile_img profileImg, r.roomNo roomNo, m.no msgNo, ms.content title, ms.regdate lastTime, r.type type FROM(SELECT b.user_no no, b.room_no roomNo, a.type type FROM chat_users a, chat_users b WHERE a.user_no = #{no} AND a.room_no = b.room_no AND b.user_no != #{no} ORDER BY b.regdate) r, users u, (SELECT room_no roomNo,MAX(no) no FROM messages GROUP BY room_no) m, messages ms WHERE u.no = r.no AND r.roomNo = m.roomNo AND m.no = ms.no ORDER BY m.no DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM chat_users WHERE user_no = #{no}) u1, (SELECT * FROM chat_users WHERE user_no = #{userNo}) u2 WHERE u1.room_no = u2.room_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_users(no, user_no, room_no, type, regdate) VALUES(chat_users_seq.nextval, #{userNo}, #{roomNo}, 'V', systimestamp )
